item.title: üìí Zamponi 2018
item.author: Zamponi et al
item.description:
Mitochondrial network complexity emerges from fission/fusion dynamics1

Mitochondrial networks exhibit a variety of complex behaviors, including coordinated cell-wide oscillations of energy states as well as a phase transition (depolarization) in response to oxidative stress.

item.title: üìí Goldberg 2017
item.author: Goldberg et al.
item.description:
Emerging whole-cell modeling principles and methods 1

Whole-cell (WC) computational models aim to predict cellular phenotypes from genotype and the environment by representing the function of each gene, gene product, and metabolite.

item.description: Quotes from Games Nothing is true, everything is permitted. - Assassin’s creed Quotes about Hope Hope in reality is the worst of all evils because it prolongs the torments of man. ‚Äï Friedrich Nietzsche Quotes from Movies People are selfish; they always want others to do the things they failed to do themselves. - Parasite (2019) Movie Never hate your enemies. It affects your judgment.
